message: It's going to happen Diane Conti Currence. January 20th 2017 the END of the Obama """"ERROR"""" thank God and the END of the political correct bleeding heart liberal Democ-rat Party. God Bless America and God Bless President Trump.

People who attempt suicide often do so because the emotional and psychological stresses in their lives have made it next to impossible to think rationally or optimistically about one's own situation. I speak as a suicide survivor, so I speak from personal experience. If you have never been in a situation that has caused you to seriously consider taking your own life, I can understand that it might be difficult to comprehend that sort of thought process. Headlines are notorious for sensationalizing aspects of stories in order to get readership, and in this case it's clear that the issue of the purse was simply pretext above and beyond the horrible abuse this woman suffered. That being said, even outside of situations of clear abuse, people who are severly depressed can be pushed over the edge by seemingly inocuous events because their minds simply cannot see the situation clearly, and almost everything can seem entirely hopeless. Again, if you have not been there, it can be extremely hard to understand or imagine. Nonetheless it might be worthwhile to try.
Prayers and Blessings sent to the family in their time of need...R.I.P

I suppose everyone can relate to Kids having clean Fun, Parents going the Extra by going ballistic with Duck tape and cardboard on their Front lawn to bring to life the fun for their Kids, but in the end the subject is the """"Corrugated Cardboard"""" material that from a legal standpoint has zero value in city ordinances as being anything substantial as far as home structures are concerned..As a matter of Fact used cardboard being re-fabricated for anything and being left to the whim of the Elements is in the classic sense Debris/Trash..Now should a Judge Rule that Cardboard configured and generically deemed Recreational as opposed to being Spent/used Cardboard and be treated as Debris, then the Judge sets a Legal precedent which opens the flood gates for anybody within the Jurisdiction to go ahead and start building Cardboard Shelters, Cardboard this and that etcâ€¦This Argument is the Legal Crux here..The Cardboard must be removed..
